env_config.flow_params:
{
    "env": {
        "additional_params": {
            "discrete": false,
            "num_observed": 2,
            "switch_time": 3.5,
            "target_velocity": 50,
            "tl_type": "controlled"
        },
        "clip_actions": true,
        "evaluate": false,
        "horizon": 900,
        "sims_per_step": 1,
        "warmup_steps": 0
    },
    "env_name": "flow.envs.traffic_light_grid_test.TrafficLightGridPOEnvTest",
    "exp_tag": "train_simulation_area",
    "initial": {
        "additional_params": {},
        "bunching": 0,
        "edges_distribution": "all",
        "lanes_distribution": Infinity,
        "min_gap": 0,
        "perturbation": 0.0,
        "shuffle": true,
        "spacing": "random",
        "x0": 0
    },
    "net": {
        "additional_params": {},
        "inflows": {
            "_InFlows__flows": []
        },
        "osm_path": null,
        "template": {
            "net": "/home/ubuntu/flow/playground/Simulation_Area/network_sa.net.xml",
            "rou": "/home/ubuntu/flow/playground/Simulation_Area/routes_sa.rou.xml",
            "vtype": "/home/ubuntu/flow/playground/Simulation_Area/vtypeflow_sa.add.xml"
        }
    },
    "network": "flow.networks.base.Network",
    "sim": {
        "color_by_speed": false,
        "emission_path": null,
        "force_color_update": false,
        "lateral_resolution": null,
        "no_step_log": true,
        "num_clients": 1,
        "overtake_right": false,
        "port": null,
        "print_warnings": true,
        "pxpm": 2,
        "render": false,
        "restart_instance": true,
        "save_render": false,
        "seed": null,
        "show_radius": false,
        "sight_radius": 25,
        "sim_step": 1,
        "teleport_time": -1,
        "use_ballistic": false
    },
    "simulator": "traci",
    "veh": []
}
